title: BBKFI emission reduction proposal
body:
As the halving proposal passed, we will proceed with the vote

Now we will vote for the emission reduction method, this is the final votation before the implementation

the bitcoin halving system is not viable on our farm, so we decided to create a BBKFI emission reduction system, now the community will vote for how this system will work

We have made some emission graphs to be easy to see how the emission will works

The team has created six emission reduction options:

1-
![-20% per month](https://i.imgur.com/iUNl4vw.png)

2-
![-10% per month](https://i.imgur.com/F9Q80Sv.png)

3-
![-10% per week](https://i.imgur.com/dKdoQQF.png)

4-
![-5% per week](https://i.imgur.com/Vqbm3sZ.png)

5-
![-1% per day](https://i.imgur.com/nKyzR9f.png)

6-
![-0.5% per day](https://i.imgur.com/UdLmHkO.png)
author: 0x11eE751AEa6c860C26b1728bD5904d80C2a00177
